      • generateQRCodeBitmap

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap generateQRCodeBitmap(java.lang.String content,
                                                           int size)
        reference: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46065310/how-to-create-a-qr-code-generator-for-android-using-fragments
        参数:
        content - the content to be stored in the QR code
        size - the QR code will be size x size
        返回:
        returns the Bitmap of the generated QR code

      • setQRCodeToImageView

        public static void setQRCodeToImageView(java.lang.String content,
                                        android.widget.ImageView imageView)
        This method generate a QR code from the content and set it to the imageView.
        参数:
        content - the message to be stored in the QR code
        imageView - the ImageView to display the QR code
